body_html:
Second @yongtang, the issue is also reproduced on TensorFlow 1.10.0, 1.12.0 as well as nightly. It appears the error comes from

lstm_output, next_state = tf.nn.dynamic_rnn(cell = cell, inputs = x, initial_state = state_in, dtype = tf.float32, time_major = False)
body_text:
Second @yongtang, the issue is also reproduced on TensorFlow 1.10.0, 1.12.0 as well as nightly. It appears the error comes from
lstm_output, next_state = tf.nn.dynamic_rnn(cell = cell, inputs = x, initial_state = state_in, dtype = tf.float32, time_major = False)
body:
Second @yongtang, the issue is also reproduced on TensorFlow 1.10.0, 1.12.0 as well as nightly. It appears the error comes from   
```
lstm_output, next_state = tf.nn.dynamic_rnn(cell = cell, inputs = x, initial_state = state_in, dtype = tf.float32, time_major = False)
```
